trans-unit.source: Defines a control and optional event of the control as an asynchronous postback control trigger that causes an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control to refresh.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en kontroll og valgfri hendelsen for kontrollen som en asynkron sende tilbake kontroll-utløser som fører til at en <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"> </xref> kontrollen skal oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Use the AsyncPostBackTrigger control to enable controls to be triggers for an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk AsyncPostBackTrigger-kontroll for å aktivere kontroller utløsere for en <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: Controls that are triggers for an update panel cause a refresh of the panel's content after an asynchronous postback.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller som er utløsere for en update-panelet føre til at for panelets innhold etter en asynkron tilbakesending.

trans-unit.source: Defining an asynchronous trigger control is useful in the following scenarios: - For controls that are outside a panel.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en asynkron utløser kontroll er nyttig i følgende situasjoner: – For kolonner som er utenfor en panelet.

trans-unit.source: - For controls that are inside a panel when the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: -For kontroller som er i et panel når den <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.ChildrenAsTriggers%2A>

trans-unit.source: - For controls that are inside nested panels, in order to cause a refresh of parent panels.
trans-unit.target: -For kolonner som er i en nestet paneler for å få en oppdatering av overordnet paneler.

trans-unit.source: The control that the AsyncPostBackTrigger control references must be in the same naming container as the update panel for which it is a trigger.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen som refererer til AsyncPostBackTrigger-kontrollen må være i samme naming beholderen som panelet oppdateringen som det er en utløser.

trans-unit.source: Triggers that are based on controls in other naming containers are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Utløsere som er basert på kontroller i andre naming beholdere støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Add AsyncPostBackTrigger controls either by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or by creating a `Triggers` element declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Legg til AsyncPostBackTrigger kontrollerer ved å bruke den **UpdatePanelTrigger samlingen redigeringsprogrammet** i designer eller ved å opprette en `Triggers` elementet deklarativt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.ControlID%2A> property is required, but the <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> property is optional.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.ControlID%2A>egenskapen er obligatorisk, men <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A>er valgfrie.</xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> property is not specified, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute> attribute of the control is used to determine the default event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt, den <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute>attributtet for kontrollen brukes til å fastsette standardhendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the default event for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel standardhendelsen for opprydding av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>kontrollen er den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A> property is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A>egenskapen skiller ikke mellom.</xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger.EventName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also reference a naming container as a trigger.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også referere til en beholder for navngivning som utløser.

trans-unit.source: In that case, all child controls in the container that cause a postback are considered triggers for the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet alle underordnede-kontroller i beholderen som forårsaker en tilbakesending regnes utløsere for den <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: Programmatically adding AsyncPostBackTrigger controls is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Legger til AsyncPostBackTrigger Kontroller programmatisk støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: To programmatically register a postback control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil registrere en sende tilbake kontroll programmatisk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.RegisterAsyncPostBackControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control when the control posts back.
trans-unit.target: Kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>kontrollerer når kontrollen legger tilbake.</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you define a control using both <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger> and AsyncPostBackTrigger, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du definerer en kontroll med både <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>og AsyncPostBackTrigger, et unntak.</xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av en <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Add <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controls either by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or by creating a `Triggers` element declaratively in the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Legg til <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>kontrollerer ved å bruke den **UpdatePanelTrigger samlingen redigeringsprogrammet** i designer eller ved å opprette en `Triggers` elementet deklarativt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> </xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Adding <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger> controls programmatically is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Legger til <xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>Kontroller programmatisk støttes ikke.</xref:System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the control that triggers an asynchronous postback for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på en kontroll som utløser en asynkron tilbakesending for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A server control ID.
trans-unit.target: En server kontroll-ID.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the postback control event that triggers an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control to be updated.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den sende tilbake kontrollhendelsen som utløser en <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"> </xref> kontrollen som skal oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: The EventName property is optional.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen hendelsesnavn er valgfrie.

trans-unit.source: If it is not specified, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute> attribute of the control is used to determine the default event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den ikke er angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute>attributtet for kontrollen brukes til å fastsette standardhendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultEventAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists default events for some common ASP.NET 2.0 controls.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser standardhendelser som for noen vanlige kontroller i ASP.NET 2.0.

trans-unit.source: |Control|Default event| |-------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>|
trans-unit.target: | Kontrollen | Standard hendelse | |-------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.TextChanged></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanged></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.CheckedChanged></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The event name.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesnavnet på.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the trigger was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om utløseren ble startet.

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the HasTriggered method to provide custom logic for determining whether the trigger was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollutviklere kan overstyre HasTriggered-metoden for å angi tilpassede logikken for å bestemme om utløseren ble startet.

trans-unit.source: To see a custom trigger in the `Triggers` element of the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, you can add an directive to the page or to the element of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en egendefinert utløser i den `Triggers` element av den <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>kontrollen, kan du legge til et direktiv til siden eller til elementet i Web.config-filen.</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the trigger was invoked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis utløseren ble startet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref> control and determines whether the event that is named in the trigger exists and is valid.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"> </xref> kontrollere og bestemmer om hendelsen som er nevnt i utløseren finnes og er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Raises the event that will trigger a postback and refresh of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer hendelsen som utløser en tilbakesending og oppdatering av en <xref href="System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The event sender.
trans-unit.target: Avsenderen hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.UI.AsyncPostBackTrigger"> </xref> kontrollen.
